definitions.text: a document appraising the value of something (as for insurance or taxation)
the respect with which a person is held
examples: they had a high estimation of his ability

definitions.text: an approximate calculation of quantity or degree or worth
examples: an estimate of what it would cost
a rough idea how long it would take

definitions.text: a judgment of the qualities of something or somebody
examples: many factors are involved in any estimate of human life
in my estimation the boy is innocent
